description:
Part A: There are so many dangers on the way to school!
Part B: Chio-chan heads to school with her childhood friend Manana.
Part C: Chio-chan is heading to school one day when she sees both Manana and Yuki waiting for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bloody Butterfly Effect / Manana to Otoro to Watashi / Bump of Slave
